casebody.data:
CRAWFORD, et al.
v.
WATLINGTON, et al. No. 241P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 9, 2008. Brenton D. Adams, Dunn, for Alfatir Crawford.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of May 2008 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of October 2008."
